Communication Studies.1: Develop the core competencies to advocate, negotiate, and relate across communicative contexts.
Communication Studies.2: Proficiently create, organize, convey, and evaluate messages.
Communication Studies.3: Understand and apply theories and methods of symbolic activity.
Communication Studies.4: Demonstrate an ability to recognize and develop a critical framework for making ethical choices surrounding communication.
Communication Studies.5: Showcase awareness of the complex nature of multiple communication contexts (such as public, interpersonal, group, organizational, intercultural).
Communication Studies.6: Recognize how message channels influence the communication process.
Communication Studies.7: Understand human diversity and the influence of diversity on communication.
Communication Studies.8: Demonstrate an ability to understand and critically evaluate historical, current and future social issues through a communicative perspective.
